div.div: EF Core uses its conventions to detect that
this is a one-to-one relationship. It therefore
adds a unique index to the foreign key to
ensure that there can be only one per book.

div.div:
The one-to-one relationship between a Book and an optional PriceOffer. If a
PriceOffer is linked to a Book, the NewPrice in the PriceOffer overrides the Price in the Book.
